backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles, portfolios, and market-data fetches with access control and Yahoo Finance HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light and dark color systems and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling hash-based navigation, authentication states, and theme selection for public vs private routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/Allocatio: Pie chart showing portfolio allocation using only holdings with live quotes.
frontend/src/components/charts/Performan: Line chart displaying historical performance for a primary asset with range selection and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Authenticated app layout with responsive sidebar behavior and top navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Displays portfolios with live metrics, navigation, and a dialog to create new portfolios. Fetches portfolio data and quotes, showing loading states and value/change indicators.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with sidebar toggle, branding, ticker search, theme switch, and portfolio dropdown. Handles navigation and mobile search dialog state.
frontend/src/components/market/LastUpdat: Shows how many seconds ago market data was updated, refreshing once per second. Hides itself if no timestamp is provided.
frontend/src/components/market/MobileTic: Mobile-friendly dialog for ticker search using the typeahead component. Manages internal query state and closes on selection.
frontend/src/components/market/TickerTyp: Implements a debounced ticker search input with dropdown results, keyboard navigation, and selection handling. Manages open/close behavior and loading states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AddEdi: Modal for adding or editing a holding using ticker search and position inputs. Validates fields, builds a Holding object, and submits via mutation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Create: Dialog for creating a new portfolio with a name field. Submits creation via mutation and handles actor readiness state.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Delete: Confirmation dialog for deleting a portfolio, calling the delete mutation and navigating home on success. Shows pending and error states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Holdin: Displays a searchable holdings table, computing metrics from quotes and supporting edit, remove, and price overrides.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Renders a clickable card summarizing portfolio value, daily changes, return, and a sparkline chart.
Provides controls to toggle public visibility of a portfolio and copy a generated public URL.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Remove: Shows a confirmation dialog for removing a holding and triggers the remove mutation.
frontend/src/components/theme/PublicThem: Forces light theme on public pages using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/actorReady.ts: Polls React Query for an initialized actor and errors on timeout or failed actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login state, persistence, and context access for authenticated identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: Fetches live quotes for stocks and crypto using React Query, caches results, and normalizes symbol handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioSimulatio: Manages portfolio simulation state with toggles, overrides, and global move controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on portfolios and holdings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for themes, and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioMath.ts: Computes holding and portfolio metrics using live quotes, avoiding fallback to stored prices.
frontend/src/lib/simulationQuotes.ts: Generates simulated quote data using overrides or global moves applied to live quotes.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Provides crypto ID mapping and utilities for parsing Yahoo and crypto API data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user portfolios with live quotes, loading states, and last-updated info.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Displays a detailed portfolio view with live or simulated quotes, editing modals, and performance/allocation charts.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPortfolioPage.t: Renders a public, read‑only portfolio view with live or simulated quotes, metrics, and charts, handling privacy/errors.
frontend/src/pages/TickerPreviewPage.tsx: Shows current and historical pricing for a ticker with charts and crypto detection.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as signed USD currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/textSearch.ts: Implements case‑insensitive text normalization and simple query‑matching helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL/session parameters including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration customizing colors, fonts, breakpoints, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing schema, feature requests, and backend price‑enrichment requirements.
